subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: With his play in Boston last weekend, Doug Mientkiewicz reinforced how much better he is in the field than Jason Giambi, and the value of defense in October is well known.
snippet: With his play in Boston last weekend, Doug Mientkiewicz reinforced how much better he is in the field than Jason Giambi, and the value of defense in October is well known.
